abstract: Søren Larsen (Danish pronunciation: [ˈsɶːɐn ˈlɑːsn̩]; born 6 September 1981) is a Danish retired professional football striker. He was a strong player with a decent header and good sense of positioning.
comment: Søren Larsen (Danish pronunciation: [ˈsɶːɐn ˈlɑːsn̩]; born 6 September 1981) is a Danish retired professional football striker. He was a strong player with a decent header and good sense of positioning.
name: Larsen, Søren
